statements: SELECT * FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_name, store_address FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_name, latitude, longitude FROM store_locations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM store_locations WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM store_locations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_name, store_address FROM store_locations WHERE latitude > 50;
SELECT * FROM store_locations WHERE longitude < -100 AND latitude > 30;
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT store_id, store_name AS Name, latitude AS Lat, longitude AS Lon FROM store_locations;
SELECT * FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_name, location FROM store_locations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, start_store_id, end_store_id, distance FROM route_planning;
SELECT store_name, location, store_id FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_id DESC;
SELECT store_name, location, store_id FROM store_locations WHERE store_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY store_id ASC;
SELECT store_name, location, store_id FROM store_locations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM route_planning WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT store_name, location FROM store_locations WHERE store_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT route_id, start_store_id, end_store_id FROM route_planning WHERE start_store_id = 2 AND end_store_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(distance) AS average_distance FROM route_planning;
SELECT * FROM StoreLocations;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location, opening_hours FROM StoreLocations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_name, location FROM StoreLocations WHERE opening_hours < '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM Routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM Routes WHERE start_location < end_location;
SELECT * FROM StoreLocations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_name, location FROM StoreLocations WHERE opening_hours > '09:00:00';
SELECT store_name, location, opening_hours FROM StoreLocations ORDER BY opening_hours DESC;
SELECT store_id, COUNT(*) AS route_count FROM Routes GROUP BY store_id HAVING route_count > 2;
SELECT store_id, store_name, latitude, longitude FROM StoreLocations INNER JOIN GeospatialData ON StoreLocations.store_id = GeospatialData.location_id;
SELECT * FROM stores;
SELECT store_name, latitude, longitude FROM stores ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT store_name, latitude, longitude FROM stores WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employees WHERE store_id = 'c8fe61b9-3ca6-4a61-b401-689060c16e7b';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT store_name, latitude, longitude FROM stores;
SELECT employee_name, role, store_id FROM employees ORDER BY role ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE store_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT route_id, distance, duration FROM routes WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM stores JOIN employees ON stores.store_id = employees.store_id WHERE stores.latitude > 40 AND employees.role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM store_locations;
SELECT store_name, latitude, longitude FROM store_locations WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT personnel_name, role FROM store_personnel ORDER BY personnel_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM store_inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM store_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM store_locations WHERE store_id = 1
SELECT store_name, latitude, longitude FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_name DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM store_inventory WHERE store_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT personnel_name, role FROM store_personnel WHERE role = 'Manager' OR role = 'Associate'
SELECT store_orders.product_name, store_orders.quantity, store_locations.store_name FROM store_orders JOIN store_locations ON store_orders.store_id = store_locations.store_id
